channel.title: Recordings on Wayne Cater
channel.description: Recent content in Recordings on Wayne Cater

item.title: Tomorrow
item.description:
Simple piano and raspy vocals underpin a soulful ballad about keeping the faith and not giving up on tomorrow!
Check it out: Apple Music Spotify YouTube

item.title: Dawn of a New Day
item.description:
Dawn of a New Day is a keyboard / synthesizer based instrumental work with cinematic overtones. Inspired by the thought that the future is still ahead, the past is behind! Seize the dawn of a new day…
Check it out: Apple Music Spotify YouTube

item.title: Unfinished Business
item.description:
Released in September 2018, Unfinished Business was a labor of love featuring 7 original piano based works. Tracks that appeared to interest listeners were On Hold, Workin' Toward Something, and Pillow Fight.
Check it out: Apple Music Spotify YouTube

item.title: No Where Fast
item.description:
No Where Fast released in March 2018, arrived with 10 original songs! Some of the fan favorites are … Pretty Little Lies – a cynical commentary of the times, Now I Do, a ballad about the blessings of small town life, and Road To Amarillo, a guitar grooving instrumental!
Check it out: Apple Music Spotify YouTube

item.title: Long Way from Home
item.description:
Containing 12 original songs and recorded in 2017, Long Way from Home features a mix of songs ranging from warm ballads like Don’t Go Away to upbeat Goin' Down This Road. Thought provoking lyrical tracks like Things to Think About remind one of what is important at the end of the day! There is an underlying feel to much of this recording that is Eagle’s like.
Check it out:
